title: 49. "Satisfied" Learning How to Appreciate Life
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we talk about being satisfied with the present moment. Are you feeling uneasy during this quarantine time and feeling as though you want to be anywhere but right here? Feeling stuck in a rut and wanting to escape your current reality? Check out this episode today! 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack

 

Book of the month mentioned: Vibrate Higher Daily by Lalah Delia

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
